Articles.Content:
Hello, Spider from the KLF General-Physics server server(you can ask if true when online), I've spent time on KSP, KLF, and steam, I figured I might as well join the forums seeing I could give some positive thoughts or discuss about things in KSP, and maybe to also mark what I've done in the game using the ribbon generator. Yeah I'm not new, except to the forums.

Spent January-February on the demo before purchasing on Late-March(checked my purchase date a few days ago so, correction to my previous mentions). Began working on SSTOs and Atmospheric Craft for travel on Kerbin since mastering Kerbal avionics last month(something that seems hard becomes so easy after gaining experience, knowledge, and the desire to master it,) < I think I just came up with my first sig right there.
Hey PanWieldingMann! Welcome to the forums. I hope you find them enjoyable.
